subject: Uniforms
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Developed by the Panthers’ coach, Johnny Majors, in the early 1970s, the beloved logo that lasted for 24 seasons is back, and Pitt faithful are snapping up anything they can get their hands on that bears it.
snippet: Developed by the Panthers’ coach, Johnny Majors, in the early 1970s, the beloved logo that lasted for 24 seasons is back, and Pitt faithful are snapping up anything they can get their hands on that bears it.
